<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Butterfly's Kiss](/Feats.aspx?ID=2705) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91)

**Prerequisites**
[Butterfly Blade Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2704)

</column>

---

You can make [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) Strikes with a butterfly sword without taking a penalty.
name: Butterfly's Kiss
